points.name: DERHb
points.label: DER Heartbeat
points.desc: Value is incremented every second by the DER with periodic resets to zero.

points.name: ControllerHb
points.label: Controller Heartbeat
points.desc: Value is incremented every second by the controller with periodic resets to zero.

points.name: AlarmReset
points.label: Alarm Reset
points.desc: Used to reset any latched alarms. 1 = Reset.
